description: This file defines the AppScaffold widget for a Flutter application, implementing a main layout with bottom navigation tabs and conditional floating action buttons for quick actions related to events and birthdays.

classes.name: AppScaffold
classes.description: A stateless widget that provides a scaffold with bottom navigation and floating action buttons for different sections of the app.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the scaffold, including app bar, body with indexed pages, bottom navigation bar, and conditional floating action button.

methods.name: _buildFab
methods.description: Helper method to create a floating action button based on the current tab index, allowing quick access to form pages for events and birthdays.
